item.name: Chatacabra Scale+
item.description: A high-quality Chatacabra scale. Its enhanced durability makes it impervious to most blows.

item.name: Bulaqchi Carapace
item.description: A high-quality Bulaqchi carapace. Easy to process and incredibly tough.

item.name: Piragill Fin+
item.description: A high-quality Piragill fin. A deep scarlet, it will slice flesh at the slightest touch.

item.name: Rathian Coin
item.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Rathian in the Arena.

pieces.name: Toe Bean Mittens α
pieces.description: Purr-fectly replicated Palico paws that allow you to wield both your weapon and the power of unbearable cuteness at once.

skill.name: Item Prolonger
skill.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

skill.name: Bombardier
skill.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

item.description: A sharp claw from a Guardian Ebony Odogaron. Its saw-like form lets it mercilessly rip apart its prey.

item.name: Hunter Symbol II
item.description: Proof that you've hunted a fierce tempered monster, certifying your fearlessness.

item.name: Guardian Pelt+
item.description: A high-quality Guardian pelt. Exceptionally smooth and tough.

item.name: Toe Bean Ticket
item.description: A ticket stamped with what appears to be a Palico's pawprint. Give it to the Smithy to get special equipment.

pieces.name: Pinion Necklace α

item.description: A large Nu Udra tentacle. A huge slab of muscle that will thrash uncontrollably even when cut off.

item.name: Nu Udra Oilmucus+
item.description: Dense Nu Udra Oilmucus. Burns unbelievably hot and long once ignited.

item.name: Necklace Ticket

pieces.name: Doshagumask α
pieces.description: An uncanny replica Doshaguma head. The mask might be fake, but the intimidating aura it exudes is as real as it gets.
